result.email_subject: EXTENDED Award-Winning Seafood Buffet at the Sheraton on the Park
result.name: Award-Winning All-You-Can-Eat Seafood Buffet
result.description: Seafood lovers rejoice with this award-winning all-you-can-eat buffet experience at Feast Restaurant, located within the five-star Sheraton on the Park in Sydney CBD! Feast on a spread of fresh seafood like tiger king prawns, Sydney rock oysters, New Zealand mussels, whole steamed salmon, spanner crab and more, not to mention freshly sliced salami and roasted meats, salads, sushi, Chinese noodles, curries, pizzas and even a decadent dessert bar. Delicious!
result.inclusions: Voucher valid for the signature seafood buffet
result.whats_included:
- Signature seafood buffet
- Valid for two or four people
- Available sittings: Monday - Thursday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm, 7:00pm, 7:30pm, 8:00pm, 8:30pm sittings, Friday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm 
- For a $20 surcharge per couple, the following sittings are also available: Friday: 6:00pm, 8:30pm, Saturday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 8:30pm, Sunday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm, 7:00pm, 7:30pm, 8:00pm and 8:30pm 
- Please note that this offer is not valid for bookings in December
result.vendor_name: Feast Restaurant @ Sheraton on the Park

The following sittings are available for a $20 surcharge per couple (payable directly to Feast Restaurant): Friday: 6:00pm, 8:30pm, Saturday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 8:30pm, Sunday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm, 7:00pm, 7:30pm, 8:00pm and 8:30pm. redemption_locations.name: Sydney CBD
redemption_locations.address: Sheraton on the Park, Level 1, 161 Elizabeth Street

result.how_to_redeem: PLEASE NOTE: NO BOOKINGS ACCEPTED THROUGH THE SHERATON ON THE PARK WEBSITE, DIMMI OR OPENTABLE. Bookings are essential and MUST be made via our online booking tool, 24 hours in advance. After purchasing, click ‘Book Online’. Insert your voucher number and select your preferred date and time. Enter your details and once complete, a booking confirmation will be sent to your email. If purchasing via our app or booking at a later time, please head to our website and go to 'My Account' to complete your booking. Please inform restaurant in the "special requests" section when booking, if bringing children, how many, and their ages. Book early to secure your desired date and time. Should Feast Restaurant need to contact you regarding your reservation they will do so via the email/phone number you have supplied upon making your booking. Please ensure you provide the valid contact details at the time of booking. Present printed or smartphone voucher on arrival

fine_print.title: Inclusions
fine_print.body: Voucher valid for the signature seafood buffet

fine_print.title: Availability
fine_print.body: Available sittings: Monday - Thursday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm, 7:00pm, 7:30pm, 8:00pm, 8:30pm sittings, Friday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm. The following sittings are available for a $20 surcharge per couple (payable directly to Feast Restaurant): Friday: 6:00pm, 8:30pm, Saturday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 8:30pm, Sunday: 12:00pm, 12:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm, 7:00pm, 7:30pm, 8:00pm and 8:30pm. Not valid: December, Public holidays and special event days.

fine_print.title: Conditions of the Deal
fine_print.body: No walk-ins accepted. No Bookings available throughout December. A maximum two-hour seating time applies to all buffet sessions. Strictly no BYO permitted. Please note, advertised menu items are a sample only and strictly subject to change. Voucher valid for dine-in only. Any additional diners may purchase from the menu at full price. Kids under 3 eat for free, and kids under 12 receive 50% off. Entire voucher must be used in one visit. Limit of two vouchers may be purchased for personal use; Two vouchers may be purchased as gifts. Maximum of one voucher redeemable per booking. Vouchers for this offer are limited and subject to availability. Not valid with any other offer. Full terms and conditions are located on the terms and conditions page of our website

fine_print.title: How to Redeem
fine_print.body: PLEASE NOTE: NO BOOKINGS ACCEPTED THROUGH THE SHERATON ON THE PARK WEBSITE, DIMMI OR OPENTABLE. Bookings are essential and MUST be made via our online booking tool, 24 hours in advance. After purchasing, click ‘Book Online’. Insert your voucher number and select your preferred date and time. Enter your details and once complete, a booking confirmation will be sent to your email. If purchasing via our app or booking at a later time, please head to our website and go to 'My Account' to complete your booking. Please inform restaurant in the "special requests" section when booking, if bringing children, how many, and their ages. Book early to secure your desired date and time. Should Feast Restaurant need to contact you regarding your reservation they will do so via the email/phone number you have supplied upon making your booking. Please ensure you provide the valid contact details at the time of booking. Present printed or smartphone voucher on arrival

fine_print.title: Changes to Booking
fine_print.body: Once booking is confirmed, no changes/cancellations permitted - your voucher will be voided

result.vendor_description: Named Brasserie/Cafe of the Year at the TAA (NSW) Awards for Excellence multiple times, Sheraton on the Park's Feast Restaurant offers a dining experience like no other. Helmed by acclaimed chef Gunnar Mueller, Feast offers a veritable celebration of the melting pot that is our multicultural city, featuring a diverse kitchen staff of 51 chefs from 20 countries.
result.changes_to_booking: Once booking is confirmed, no changes/cancellations permitted - your voucher will be voided
